about_the_game:
Deep Copy is a top down point-and-click literary adventure set in a hand-painted science fiction world. Awakened with no memory, you must solve puzzles and navigate a branching story to piece together the dense, interconnected mystery at the heart of the lab.

A SIREN SOUNDS, AND YOU AWAKEN

A klaxon alarm screams through a laboratory and your eyes creak open. Who are you? Where are you? Your head rings, and you do not know. One thing is certain: the Scientist is still inside the building, and he is coming. Explore the hand-painted laboratory, solve environmental puzzles, and debate with the myriad voices inside your head as you try to escape and save your soul.

TOP DOWN, LITERARY, CRPG INSPIRED

Deep Copy is a top down point-and-click literary adventure set in a world of dark science fiction. You are...well, you're not sure. You're an amnesiac, awakened among a creche of life support tanks in an abandoned laboratory. Someone, or something, has left behind a dense and interconnected web of mystery in the ruins of the laboratory, and you're at the center of it.

Inspired by literary classics like Disco Elysium and Planescape Torment, Deep Copy is a unique blend of the interactivity and puzzles of point-and-click adventure games with the deep, reactive story and beautiful writing of big CRPGs.

FIND SECRETS, SOLVE PUZZLES, ESCAPE

Explore a laboratory overflowing with puzzles and meticulous, hand-placed secrets. There is more than meets the eye. Use and debate with the two factions of your mind, Divination and Intelligence, as they guide you to damnation or salvation. Interact with a cast of strange characters through branching dialogues and make real choices that affect everything around you as you try to escape...by any means.

content_descriptors.notes: Deep Copy contains mature themes of death and human experimentation.
